channel.title: Error Connecting To Server
channel.description:
:eek: 10-60 SerVers at least have gone down at the same time?
i was playing yesterday with 5 other people and we were talking over headsets..
then all of a sudden the server we were playing on just collasped.
so we tried others all came up with
ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER IT MAY BE DOWN.
Any mods can shed some light on it?
Heres the one we were on at the time. roflscape.no-ip.biz Unsure if it may of started there.

yh, the no-ip is down and it be up shortly, 1-3 hours maybe a day,
